text: British Steel is the third studio album by Judas Priest. Judas Priest is an English heavy metal band. Columbia Records released the album on 11 April 1980. The album had three singles: "Living After Midnight", "Breaking the Law", and "United". British Steel is the band's first album with Dave Holland playing the drums. Many music critics liked the album. Rolling Stone wrote that it was one of the 100 Greatest Metal Albums of All Time. British Steel was number 4 on the UK Albums Chart."Official Albums Chart Top 100". Official Charts Company. Retrieved 28 June 2023. == Track listing == == References == Category:1980 albums Category:Judas Priest albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: British Steel (album)
